org.jeo.vector

Interface VectorDataset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Dataset, Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSVDataset, GeoJSONDataset, GeoPkgVector, MemVector, MongoDataset, OGRDataset, PostGISDataset

    public interface VectorDataset
extends Dataset
    A data set consisting of objects with a vector geometry, known as Feature objects.
    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long count(VectorQuery q)
      Counts features in the data set.
      FeatureCursor cursor(VectorQuery q)
      Returns a feature cursor for the data set.
      Schema schema()
      The schema for the data set.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jeo.data.Dataset

        bounds, crs, description, driver, driverOptions, name, title

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jeo.data.Disposable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • schema

        Schema schema()
              throws IOException
        The schema for the data set.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • count

        long count(VectorQuery q)
           throws IOException
        Counts features in the data set.
        Parameters:
        q - Query used to constrain results, must not be null
        Throws:
        IOException

      • cursor

        FeatureCursor cursor(VectorQuery q)
                     throws IOException
        Returns a feature cursor for the data set.

        VectorQuery.mode() is used to control whether the cursor is read or write. All implementations must support Cursor.Mode.READ.

        Parameters:
        q - A query used to constrain results, must not be null.
        Throws:
        IOException
